definition: Ai (c. 2000 BC), sixth of legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God, also known as Li 釐|厘[Li2]

sentences.english: I hope you got interested in the request.
sentences.chinese: 同時希望您眷注我的哀告。

sentences.english: Listen! Your brother's blood cries out to me from the ground.
sentences.chinese: 你兄弟的血有聲音從地裏向我哀告。

sentences.english: No one hears their cries—no one but God, who hears and is merciful.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人能聽到他們的哀告，唯獨慈愛的神能聽到。

sentences.english: Listen to all the voices rising from the ground today.
sentences.chinese: 且聽今天從地裏發出的各種哀告。

sentences.english: Can we hear the voices that cry out from the ground today?
sentences.chinese: 在今天，我們能聽見從地裏發出的哀告的聲音嗎？

sentences.english: The victims' families of the murder have appealed to the Supreme Court to have a definitive answer.
sentences.chinese: 謀殺案的被害家屬已經哀告最高法院作切當的復興。

sentences.english: She probably has the highest stards of any designer in the office ensures that every project is top quality.
sentences.chinese: 她高尺度嚴哀告，以確保每個項目都是最高質量。

sentences.english: Some people find it difficult to other people.
sentences.chinese: 有些人覺得哀告援手很貧窶。
